# Import user roles

Learn how to import user roles from a Zuora tenant to OneID using the Admin Console.

OneID allows you to import user roles from a Zuora tenant to OneID.

To import Zuora tenant user roles to OneID, take the following steps:

1.  Navigate to Admin Console > User Roles .
2.  From the View Role List list, select a tenant that the imported user roles belong to. All the Zuora tenants of your organization are listed here.
3.  Click Import User Role . The Import User Roles window opens.
4.  In the window, select the user roles you want to import. Each row in the table represents a possible OneID user role with tenant user roles of each Zuora product.
    1.  Select the checkbox to the left of a user role.
    2.  Optional: Rename the user role:

        1.  Click the pencil icon ![edit.png](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/88e28467-bd23-429a-b963-52fe1d34cc73?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..FnwrKfKPya86zflM6OjxgEnl5hzz2Qmis5WRVHNlHUs) to the right of this user role to make the Role Name column editable.

        2.  Enter a new name in the Role Name column.

        3.  Click the disk icon ![save.png](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/0ecdfa78-21a2-45de-a4e7-4e5096839c9e?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..wmMSGXGo4fMt7VcyaJZk7rq0x5_a7biQ5X5GhfiAsZo) to the right of this user role to confirm the change.


    3.  Repeat steps a and b as needed.
5.  Click Import . You can find the imported user roles on the User Roles page.
